# consul Provider

## Schema

### Optional

- `address` (String)
- `ca_file` (String)
- `ca_path` (String)
- `ca_pem` (String)

- `cert_pem` (String)
- `datacenter` (String)
- `header` (Block List) Additional headers to send with each Consul request. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--header))

- `insecure_https` (Boolean)
- `key_file` (String)
- `key_pem` (String)
- `namespace` (String)
- `scheme` (String)
- `token` (String, Sensitive)
